Text: Generate a short paragraph about 'nutrition' targeting readability level Early Elementary. Limit the output to 200 words. What is nutrition? Nutrition is like giving your body the right foods it needs to grow and stay healthy. Imagine your body is a car. Just like a car needs gas to run, your body needs food for energy. There are many types, like proteins for building muscles, vitamins for keeping you strong, and minerals for helping your body work properly. Eating a variety of foods, like fruits, vegetables, whole grains, and lean proteins, gives your body all the nutrients it needs. So, eating nutritious food is like filling your body's tank with the best gas to keep you running and playing all day!
